results.title: Junkie's ruminations
results.creator_credit: Kylie O'Brien and ACMI Digital Storytelling
results.brief_description: Kylie O’Brien feels society has reviled drug users. She provides an insight to the world through her eyes, as well as through her art and music.

results.title: Dear mother
results.creator_credit: Judith Mahfoud and ACMI Digital Storytelling
results.brief_description: Life wasn’t meant to be easy, but it still can be profoundly beautiful. Judith delves into the childhood of her mother, to try to understand her better so she can pass this knowledge to her five sons and to honour the life of her mother, who grew up feeling like she was nobody’s child.
results.description: Life wasn’t meant to be easy, but it still can be profoundly beautiful. Judith delves into the childhood of her mother, to try to understand her better so she can pass this knowledge to her five sons and to honour the life of her mother, who grew up feeling like she was nobody’s child.

results.title: Beyond the Big Issue : Digital Storytelling project
results.brief_description: Nine of Melbourne’s homeless and disabled share the stories of their lives and talk about how The Big Issue has changed their circumstances. They also talk about their interests, friends, family, daily struggles and how working for the Big Issue has helped restore dignity to their lives.
results.title_for_label: Beyond the Big Issue : Digital Storytelling project

They also talk about their interests, friends, family, daily struggles and how working for the Big Issue has helped restore dignity to their lives.

results.title: Homage to the herbster
results.creator_credit: Leo Kane and ACMI Digital Storytelling
results.brief_description: Sometimes he inscribes his name in wet cement. As long as he spells it correctly, I’ll let it ride. A simple tale of an intense relationship between a Big Issue vendor and his terrier, his partner in both work and life.
results.description: Sometimes he inscribes his name in wet cement. As long as he spells it correctly, I’ll let it ride. A simple tale of an intense relationship between a Big Issue vendor and his terrier, his partner in both work and life.

results.title: Super Flight
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Beyond 2000”.
A Beyond 2000 special which looks at the latest advances in aeronautics, from ultra-lights to gyrocopters, from fighters to paraplanes, in fact every way in which man can currently take to the air.

group_siblings.creator_credit: Beyond International

results.title: Eternal Youth
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Beyond 2000”.
Everybody wants it, and many have searched for it. “Beyond 2000” explores the growth of the life prolonging industry and the study of gerontology. It’s a penetrating look at a topic dear to each and everyone of us - life!
results.description:

results.title: Climate in crisis
results.creator_credit: Jeff Gale, Judith John-Story, David Mason, Jeremy Evans, BBC-TV and For Beyond Productions
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Beyond 2000”.
A “Beyond 2000”, joint B.B.C. production which gives an overview of the problems associated with the Greenhouse Effect. A series of small episodes which clearly explains what the Greenhouse Effect is and its impact on the earth both now and in the future. The programs also discuss stategies and plans that may help turn around the environmental exploitation of our finite resources.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Jeff Gale, Judith John-Story, David Mason, Jeremy Evans, BBC-TV and For Beyond Productions

results.title: Confidence in contact
results.creator_credit: Bill Latto and Town and Country Productions
results.brief_description:
Episode number 2 of Series “Better Rugby”.
New methods of introducing and developing the techniques of tackling in rugby football. After building surprising ability and confidence in junior players, Barry John (Wales and British Lions) and Willie John McBride (Ireland and British Lions) show how the same coaching methods can be used in giving senior players complete confidence in going in for the tackle.
